name: Streadata.io API Gallery - DNS Check
description: This is a repository of dns check APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: DNS Check
apis.description: Monitor DNS records. Request DNS updates by sharing reports that show the pass/fail status of each record. Troubleshoot DNS issues. DNS records are automatically re-checked, and reports updated. DNS records can be imported from a zone file, or added in...
